attributes.action: Government to Urgently get up to German levels for coronavirus testing
attributes.additional_details: It is clear that mass testing for the virus helps to stop the spread as has been found in Germany and South Korea the targets et by the government needs to be much more aggressive particularly with NHS, Care homes and people who are employed as carers
attributes.background: Accelerate the urgency for coronavirus testing as  we are way behind the levels of other countries

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
